function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of tactile input in webshop experience","Impact":"Reduced user engagement and satisfaction due to limited sensory experience","Mitigation":"Implement tactile input technology in webshop interface","Technologies":"Haptic feedback devices, tactile touchscreens","People":"Online retailers, webshop developers","Owner":"Online retailers, technology developers"},{"Description":"Increased reliance on visual and auditory stimuli","Impact":"Neglect of tactile diagnostic properties during online shopping","Mitigation":"Integration of technologies for tactile assessment of products","Technologies":"3D virtual try-on, haptic technology for tactile feedback","People":"Online retailers, consumers","Owner":"Online retailers, technology developers"},{"Description":"Higher mobile traffic during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through high-touch surfaces such as mobile devices","Mitigation":"Encourage regular cleaning of mobile devices and promote touchless technologies","Technologies":"Self-cleaning coatings, touchless interfaces","People":"Mobile device users","Owner":"Mobile device manufacturers, health authorities"}]}
